name: Mahjong 3 Full
description:
Presenting new title by 1C Wireless – Mahjong 3! Your goal is to match and remove all tile pieces from the tower.

Enjoy three game modes:

• Classic - The original game; play as long as you want!
• Time Attack - Play is timed.
• Challenge - You have a limited time to choose your Tiles; for advanced players! The faster you choose, the bigger your bonus for that move!

Win in Challenge mode to unlock more towers!

Features:

• Large and clear graphics of mahjong tiles! Best for your eyes!
• Full undo!
• Different backgrounds and themes!
• New super SHUFFLE feature when no more moves are available!
• Hints: possible moves can be highlighted!

This free solitaire game is also known as Mahjong Solitaire, Taipei Mahjongg, Shanghai Mah-Jong, Chinese Mahjong, Mahjong Trails, Mahjong Titans, Kyodai.
